page.title: 19AMENITIES and FACILITIES
page.content: Our area differs from corner to corner.One part is an industrial estate with factories and distributors.The rest of the area is mainly housing.Some houses are privately owned but most are council houses.There are quite a few shops, a Police sub-station,a Lower school and a Middle school. A railway runs through the middle of the area.Three bus routes also pass through the area they are the 8/28, the 2/20 and the 22 services. The factories include a disused oil storage depot and three wholesalers. There are also some government offices. Some of the local people work on the estate. There is a Youth Centre which caters for the teenagers and an Old Peoples Centre but no other entertainments.
